scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-js && npm run build-copy
scripts.build-js: browserify screen-1.js -t envify -o dist/1/screen-1.js && browserify screen-2.js -t envify -o dist/2/screen-2.js && browserify screen-3.js -t envify -o dist/3/screen-3.js
scripts.build-copy: cp screen-1.html dist/1/index.html && cp screen-2.html dist/2/index.html && cp screen-3.html dist/3/index.html && cp -R assets dist/1/assets && cp -R assets dist/2/assets && cp -R assets dist/3/assets
